thread.title: A Spin in the Most Important Car Ever Built

author: A.J. Baime
title: A Spin in the Most Important Car Ever Built
text:
Tim Kelly, 58, a Schaumburg, Ill.-based retired private-equity investment manager, and Carrie Kelly, 59, a nursing professor, on their Ford Model T’s, as told to A.J. Baime. 

Tim: I never dreamed of one day having a car collection. Then I saw a Model T buried in a friend’s barn. I thought, I would love to take something like that and rebuild it back to its old grandeur. Over 10 years later, my wife and I have a collection of 13 vehicles, including a 1905 Holsman and a British tank, and we built a log cabin in Lake Geneva,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
